long_description: Pick up the pace and enjoy the comfort of the REI Fleet long-sleeve T-shirt. Moisture-wicking fabric dries fast so you won't feel chilled when a breeze kicks up. Fabric provides UPF 50+ protection from harmful solar rays. Mesh inserts along back enhance ventilation. Reflective details increase visibility in low light. Flatlock seams reduce chafing and dropped rear hem increases coverage. The women's REI Fleet long-sleeve T-shirt offers an active fit that moves with you during workouts.
short_description: Pick up the pace and enjoy the comfort of the REI Fleet long-sleeve T-shirt.
